name: Jie Wu 0001
content: Dr. Jie Wu Jie Wu, Ph.D., Fellow of AAAS, and Fellow of IEEE Director of Center for Networked Computing (CNC) Laura H. Carnell Professor, Department of Computer and Information Sciences Temple University Openings Positions available for Ph.D. students with assistantships, including visiting scholars/students Research Center Center for Networked Computing (CNC) Recent Publications 2025 Publications: IEEE/ACM ToN, IEEE TMC, IEEE TKDE, IEEE TSC, IEEE TWC, EDBT'25, ICASSP'25, INFOCOM'25, ICDE'25, ICDCS'25, IJCAI'25, and ICPP'25 2024 Publications: IEEE/ACM ToN, IEEE TMC, IEEE TDSC, IEEE TKDE, IEEE TSC, IEEE TNSE, IEEE TWC, IEEE TCC, INFOCOM'24, ICDCS'24, ICDE'24, and SECON'24 2023 Publications: IEEE/ACM ToN, IEEE TMC, IEEE TPDS, IEEE JSAC, IEEE TDSC, IEEE TWC, IEEE TCC, INFOCOM'23, IWQoS'23 2022 Publications: IEEE/ACM ToN, IEEE TMC, IEEE TPDS, IEEE JSAC, IEEE TDSC, IEEE TSC, IEEE TCC, INFOCOM'22, IWQoS'22, and CNS'22 2021 Publications: IEEE/ACM ToN, IEEE TMC, IEEE TPDS, ACM TKDD, ACM TIT, IEEE TSC, IEEE TBD, IEEE TNSE, IEEE TDSC, IEEE TIFS, INFOCOM'21, IWQoS'21, and ICPP'21 2020 Publications: IEEE/ACM ToN, IEEE TMC, IEEE TPDS, IEEE TNSE, IEEE THMS, IEEE TII, INFOCOM'20, WWW'20, PerCom'20, SECON'20, ICPP'20, ICDCS'20, MobiHoc'20, and NIPS'20 2019 Publications: ACM TSN, IEEE JSAC, IEEE TMC, IEEE TVT, IEEE TKDB, IEEE TPDS, IEEE TSC, IEEE TNSE, SECON'19, ICDCS'19, DSN'19, and CNS'19 2018 Publications: IEEE TMC, IEEE TBD, IEEE TSC, IEEE TNSE, ICDCS'18, CNS'18, Percom'18, IWQoS'18, ICPP'18, and ICNP'18 New Book: Network Security Empowered by Artificial Intelligence, Springer, 2024 New Book: Mobile Crowdsourcing: From Theory to Practice, Springer, 2023 New Book: Fog/Edge Computing For Security, Privacy, and Applications, Springer, 2021 New Book: Opportunistic Mobile Social Networks, Taylor & Francis, 2014 (Book Review) New Book: Energy-Aware Scheduling on Multiprocessor Platforms, Springer, 2013 Sample Publications: 1985-2013 and Top-25: self-rated Sample Recent Publications: J. Li, J. Wang, W. Liang, J. Wu, Q. Chen, and Z. Xu, "Social-Aware DT-Assisted Service Provisioning in Serverless Edge Computing," (MASS 2024). Best paper Award. [Slides] C. Wu, M. Xiao, J. Wu, Y. Xu, J. Zhou, and H. Sun, "Towards Federated Learning on Fresh Datasets," (MASS 2023). Best paper Award. [Slides] J. Wu, "On Cost-Optimal Parallel Solution of the Majority Problem," (APDCM 2023). [Slides] Z. Li, K. Hwang, K. Li, J. Wu, and T. Ji, "Graph-generative Neural Network for EEG-based Epileptic Seizure Detection via Discovery of Dynamic Brain Functional Connectivity," (Scientific Reports-Nature.com 2022). J. Wu, "A Note on a Combinatorics Partition Problem," (Academia Letters 2022) (English)(Chinese). J. Wu and S. Jiang, "On Increasing Scalability and Liquidation of Lightning Networks for Blockchains," (TNSE 2022). A. Sawwan and J. Wu, "Minimizing Epidemic Viral Total Exposure under the Droplet and Aerosol Models," (ICDH 2021). J. Shang and J. Wu, "Protecting Real-time Video Chat against Fake Facial Videos Generated by Face Reenactment," (ICDCS 2020). J. Wu and N. Wang, "Approximating Special Social Influence Maximization Problems," (Tsinghua Science and Technology 2020) J. Wu, "Challenges and Opportunities in Algorithmic Solutions for Re-Balancing in Bike Sharing Systems," (Tsinghua Science and Technology 2020). J. Wu, "A Multi-tiered Network with Aerial and Ground Coverage," (CC 2018). J. Wu, Y. Chen, and H. Zheng, "Approximation Algorithms for Dependency-Aware Rule-Caching in Software-Defined Networks, " (GLOBECOM 2018). J. Wu, S. Lu, and H. Zheng, "On Maximum Elastic Scheduling of Virtual Machines for Cloud-based Data Center Networks," (ICC 2018).[Slides] J. Wu, "Uncovering the Useful Structures of Complex Networks in Socially-Rich and Dynamic Environments," (ICDCS 2017). [Slides] [Video] H. Zheng, W. Chang, and J. Wu, "Coverage and Distinguishability Requirements for Traffic Flow Monitoring Systems," (IWQoS 2016). [Slides] J. Wu, " Stable Matching Beyond Bipartite Graphs," (APDCM) (in conjunction with IEEE IPDPS 2016). [Slides] J. Wu and Y. Wang, "Hypercube-based Multi-path Social Feature Routing in Human Contact Networks," (TC 2014). J. Wu, "Collaborative Mobile Charging and Coverage," (JCST 2014). [Slides] J. Wu, M. Xiao, and L. Huang, "Homing Spread: Community Home-based Multi-copy Routing in Mobile Social Networks,"(INFOCOM 2013). [Slides] C. Liu and J. Wu, "Practical Routing in a Cyclic MobiSpace," (ToN 2011).
